post:
[BudgetNo.De](https://budgetno.de)

**KVM-LEB**
- 256MB RAM
- 1 Core
- 1 IPv4
- 5 IPv6
- 500GB Bandwidth
- 100Mbit portspeed
- 20GB Disk
- Centos + Debian 32/64bit (More ISOs available soon! [Or on request])
- $5.00/mo. or $50/yr.
- KC, MO location
- [>>ORDER NOW<<](https://fedorait.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=22)

**Notes**
- You will be able to mount an ISO and install via the control panel
- All KVM nodes will be deployed within 24 hours time
- Open a ticket in the client area to request an ISO to be uploaded

**I/O Test**
<pre>
root@test:~# dd if=/dev/zero of=test bs=1024k count=1000
1000+0 records in
1000+0 records out
1048576000 bytes (1.0 GB) copied, 4.84215 s, 217 MB/s
root@test:~#
</pre>

**Test IP**
- 63.141.226.131

**Control Panel Screenshot (SolusVM)**

- [https://budgetno.de/examples/control1.png](https://budgetno.de/examples/control1.png)

**Reviews**

> I'd go with B+. I don't really have much time to thoroughly test it out, but from what I've looked at so far it's quite good.
